name: PokeRogue
subtitle: Source for PokeRogue on iOS
description: This source provides the latest releases of PokeRogue for iOS

apps.name: PokeRogue
apps.subtitle: A Pokémon-themed roguelike game
apps.localizedDescription: a browser-based Rogue-lite Pokémon battling game spanning all 9 generations for iOS. https://pokerogue.net/

versions.localizedDescription:
Fixed extended memory mode
Improved Bluetooth controller support to reduce dropped connections
made network loss handling less aggressive to prevent random app restarts.
